description: This file defines the UI for the audiobook player's screen in a Flutter application. It includes widgets for displaying the current audiobook, playback controls, and seeking functionality, utilizing Flutter's material components and custom themes.

classes.name: PlayerScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the audiobook player interface, including header and conditional content based on current audiobook state.

classes.name: _EmptyPlayer
classes.description: A widget that shows when no audiobook is currently loaded, prompting the user to select one.

classes.name: _PlayerBody
classes.description: Stateful widget managing playback controls, display, and seeking within the current audiobook.

classes.name: _SkipButton
classes.description: A small widget encapsulating a button to skip forward or backward in playback, with visual feedback on press.

methods.name: _formatMs
methods.description: Formats milliseconds into a 'mm:ss' string for display.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each of the main widgets.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates state objects for stateful widgets.

methods.name: _pulse
methods.description: Animates the scale of the skip button when pressed.
